entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus Snape is mentioned as being closeted with Harry Potter in the evenings. He asks Dumbledore why he is spending time with Potter.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as looking weary and discussing information with Harry Potter.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as being closeted with Severus Snape in the evenings. Dumbledore spends time with him to give him information.

relationships.description: Dumbledore trusts Harry Potter and gives him information.
Severus Snape does not trust Dumbledore, as he is giving secrets to Harry Potter.
Dumbledore gives information to Harry Potter.
Severus Snape is closeted with Harry Potter in the evenings.
